title: Permanently banned with out a single warning? not even chat restriction or a 2 week ban?
body:
My name is The Luck Train, and that past couple of games i had played on The Luck Train i was a little toxic ill admit. But that is because i was having problems at home and i was taking it out innocently on the players in the game. And i was not even that toxic, i feel like a chat restriction would have make more sense in this situation so please. Or even a two week ban, which would make it my first temp ban ever on that account so please, if you can, review the case. Thank you,
The Luck Train

Sounds like there are three possibilities here:

1. Your interpretation of the behavior in question ("not even that toxic") is vastly different from both the other players in the game and the Rioter(s) who would have manually escalated your account to a permanent ban.
 - Your post here does not follow the typical pattern of an outrageously toxic player that believes they've been unjustly punished, (i.e. "FUCK YOU RIOT UNBAN MY ACCOUNT NOW!!!") which is definitely a point to your side in this Boards case you're making.

2. Mistake on Riot's end.
 - Possible. Not hugely likely, but most definitely not off the table. Send a support ticket and have a discussion.

3. The ban was for reasons other than behavior.
 - Regardless of the reason for punishment, you should have received an email about it. Check that and see if it might be a problem with chargeback or account compromisation.

I find that Boards are a fairly unreliable way of contacting Riot staff. I would recommend submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead. I've always been able to get a response from Riot that way.

A couple notes before you proceed:
-To my knowledge, it is very unusual for Riot to overturn a ban. It does happen from time to time, but only when the ban was clearly an error on their part.
-Support and Player Behavior have a constant backlog of tickets to go through. It's not unusual for a response to take weeks. Don't bump your ticket after you submit it, that moves you back to the bottom of the queue.
